summary: Oscar jokes about Hytale branding suggestions
mainText:
'Just some branding suggestions for Hytale:
Hytale social network: Mytale
Hytale commerative tie: Tietale
Hytale behind the scenes film: Whytale
Hytale dinner: Pietale
Hytale tissue boxes: Crytale
Hytale themed memorial service: Byetale 

Can you help me pitch more ideas?' by Oscar Garvin

summary: Slikey says you can pause in singleplayer
mainText: 'You hit escape and it pauses the game while you are in the escape menu...' by Slikey

summary: Slikey clarifies pausing in SP and MP
mainText: 'You can pause in singelplayer. Just because the singleplayer is backed by a local server, that doesn't mean you can't pause. On a multiplayer server that is only an option for the server owners.' by Slikey

summary: Slikey says server operators could pause a server
mainText: 'I don't think it is in the menu right now but programmatically or via a comment - maybe we add a operator menu for stuff like this. I could see an option to pause the server when no players are there.. Lots of options, we'll see what the community wants.' by Slikey

summary: Simon posts first picture of Slothian
mainText: 'IMAGE' by Simon

summary: Simon gives status of Slothian models
mainText: 'All of the Slothian models are broken except this one, they will be fixed soon :o' by Simon

summary: Slikey says you CAN play without an internet connection in SP.
mainText:
'You can. The "local server" is just a program we run on your computer to allow you to join singleplayer.' by Slikey

(Offline play)

summary: Simon responds to Olegro saying Slothians look more advanced than he thought
mainText: 'Of course' by Simon

mainText: 'I found a Faun model in the files.ðŸ‘€' by Simon

summary: Simon reconfirms community contributing to Hytale code base
mainText: 'Look at the blog post about modding, we talk about doing it yep' by Simon

summary: Simon teases reason for not sharing Faun model
mainText: 'hey I need to keep some surprises' by Simon

summary: Simon has offered to share the Faun screenshots/clip with KweebecCorner
mainText: 'I have contacted @KweebecCorner and offered him exclusive screenshots/clip for it. Let's see if he wants to do it now :P' by Simon

summary: Slikey explains potential for "Create Mod" in Hytale
mainText: 'We believe it may be too early for us to support a mod like Create. Some parts should be possible with the support of animated models used as blocks. Moving structures is something we want to add eventually but there is a lot of listening and homework in front of us. Conceptually our vision will get those results but the tech is not there yet.' by Slikey

summary: Simon says no Mobile Hytale for a while.
mainText: 'Mobile version? Not gonna happen for a while unfortunately' by Simon
